WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been open for 30+ days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with current files and references to the versions affected.
WorkItem.Description: Upon attempting to load rawr I get a message saying, "Rawr has stopped working windows is checking for a solution to the problem."  This error seems to occur no matter the version of rawr I attempt to load.  I am running windows vista 64 bit.

Comments.Message: What is the full path of where you are running Rawr?

That means that something went wrong outside of Rawr. You could try reinstalling the latest .NET Framework, and/or turning off (or whitelisting Rawr in) antivirus/firewall programs, updating OS, repairing OS, reinstalling OS, etc.
